name: Northern Blades
description:
Enjoy an exciting adventure in the northern lands with our heroes! You will have to endure many trials, see the death of your comrades, feel the pain of betrayal and lies. All this for the sake of one... Freedom.

Features:
  • Original Soundtrack
  • High-quality 2D sprites and backgrounds
  • A fascinating story
  • Dynamic story with the gradual addition of acts

WARNING!
At the moment, only the first act of this visual novel is available to you, subsequent acts will open over time in the form of free updates.
